segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 12
segments.en: Linked Discourses 12

segments.pli: 1. Buddhavagga
segments.en: 1. The Buddhas

segments.pli: 4. Vipassīsutta
segments.en: 4. About Vipassī

segments.pli: Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati … pe …
segments.en: At Sāvatthī.

segments.pli: “vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
segments.en: “Mendicants, Vipassī the Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha had this thought before his awakening, when he was still unawakened but intent on awakening:

segments.pli: ‘kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca.
segments.en: ‘Alas, this world has fallen into trouble. It’s born, grows old, dies, passes away, and is reborn,

segments.pli: Atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa.
segments.en: yet it doesn’t understand how to escape from this suffering, from old age and death.

segments.pli: Kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti?
segments.en: Oh, when will an escape be found from this suffering, from old age and death?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī, the one intent on awakening, thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists is there old age and death? What is a condition for old age and death?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti.
segments.en: ‘When rebirth exists there’s old age and death. Rebirth is a condition for old age and death.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jāti hoti, kiṃpaccayā jātī’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists is there rebirth? What is a condition for rebirth?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘bhave kho sati jāti hoti, bhavapaccayā jātī’ti.
segments.en: ‘When continued existence exists there’s rebirth. Continued existence is a condition for rebirth.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati bhavo hoti, kiṃpaccayā bhavo’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists is there continued existence? What is a condition for continued existence?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘upādāne kho sati bhavo hoti, upādānapaccayā bhavo’ti.
segments.en: ‘When grasping exists there’s continued existence. Grasping is a condition for continued existence.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati upādānaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā upādānan’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists is there grasping? What is a condition for grasping?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘taṇhāya kho sati upādānaṃ hoti, taṇhāpaccayā upādānan’ti.
segments.en: ‘When craving exists there’s grasping. Craving is a condition for grasping.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati taṇhā hoti, kiṃpaccayā taṇhā’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists is there craving? What is a condition for craving?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘vedanāya kho sati taṇhā hoti, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā’ti.
segments.en: ‘When feeling exists there’s craving. Feeling is a condition for craving.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vedanā hoti, kiṃpaccayā vedanā’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists is there feeling? What is a condition for feeling?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘phasse kho sati vedanā hoti, phassapaccayā vedanā’ti.
segments.en: ‘When contact exists there’s feeling. Contact is a condition for feeling.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati phasso hoti, kiṃpaccayā phasso’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists is there contact? What is a condition for contact?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘saḷāyatane kho sati phasso hoti, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso’ti.
segments.en: ‘When the six sense fields exist there’s contact. The six sense fields are a condition for contact.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati saḷāyatanaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā saḷāyatanan’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists are there the six sense fields? What is a condition for the six sense fields?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘nāmarūpe kho sati saḷāyatanaṃ hoti, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanan’ti.
segments.en: ‘When name and form exist there are the six sense fields. Name and form are a condition for the six sense fields.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati nāmarūpaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā nāmarūpan’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists are there name and form? What is a condition for name and form?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘viññāṇe kho sati nāmarūpaṃ hoti, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpan’ti.
segments.en: ‘When consciousness exists there are name and form. Consciousness is a condition for name and form.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā viññāṇan’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists is there consciousness? What is a condition for consciousness?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘saṅkhāresu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hoti, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇan’ti.
segments.en: ‘When choices exist there’s consciousness. Choices are a condition for consciousness.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho sati saṅkhārā honti, kiṃpaccayā saṅkhārā’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what exists are there choices? What is a condition for choices?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘avijjāya kho sati saṅkhārā honti, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’ti.
segments.en: ‘When ignorance exists there are choices. Ignorance is a condition for choices.’

segments.pli: Iti hidaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā;
segments.en: And so, ignorance is a condition for choices.

segments.pli: saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ … pe …
segments.en: Choices are a condition for consciousness. …

segments.pli: evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
segments.en: That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.

segments.pli: ‘Samudayo, samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
segments.en: ‘Origination, origination.’ While Vipassī was intent on awakening, such was the vision, knowledge, wisdom, realization, and light that arose in him regarding teachings not learned before from another.

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist is there no old age and death? When what ceases do old age and death cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘jātiyā kho asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When rebirth doesn’t exist there’s no old age and death. When rebirth ceases, old age and death cease.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jāti na hoti, kissa nirodhā jātinirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist is there no rebirth? When what ceases does rebirth cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘bhave kho asati jāti na hoti, bhavanirodhā jātinirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When continued existence doesn’t exist there’s no rebirth. When continued existence ceases, rebirth ceases.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati bhavo na hoti, kissa nirodhā bhavanirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist is there no continued existence? When what ceases does continued existence cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘upādāne kho asati bhavo na hoti, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When grasping doesn’t exist there’s no continued existence. When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati upādānaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā upādānanirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist is there no grasping? When what ceases does grasping cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘taṇhāya kho asati upādānaṃ na hoti, taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When craving doesn’t exist there’s no grasping. When craving ceases, grasping ceases.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati taṇhā na hoti, kissa nirodhā taṇhānirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist is there no craving? When what ceases does craving cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘vedanāya kho asati taṇhā na hoti, vedanānirodhā taṇhānirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When feeling doesn’t exist there’s no craving. When feeling ceases, craving ceases.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati vedanā na hoti, kissa nirodhā vedanānirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist is there no feeling? When what ceases does feeling cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘phasse kho asati vedanā na hoti, phassanirodhā vedanānirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When contact doesn’t exist there’s no feeling. When contact ceases, feeling ceases.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati phasso na hoti, kissa nirodhā phassanirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist is there no contact? When what ceases does contact cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘saḷāyatane kho asati phasso na hoti, saḷāyatananirodhā phassanirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When the six sense fields don’t exist there’s no contact. When the six sense fields cease, contact ceases.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati saḷāyatanaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā saḷāyatananirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist are there no six sense fields? When what ceases do the six sense fields cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘nāmarūpe kho asati saḷāyatanaṃ na hoti, nāmarūpanirodhā saḷāyatananirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When name and form don’t exist there are no six sense fields. When name and form cease, the six sense fields cease.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati nāmarūpaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā nāmarūpanirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist are there no name and form? When what ceases do name and form cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘viññāṇe kho asati nāmarūpaṃ na hoti, viññāṇanirodhā nāmarūpanirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When consciousness doesn’t exist there are no name and form. When consciousness ceases, name and form cease.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati viññāṇaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā viññāṇanirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist is there no consciousness? When what ceases does consciousness cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘saṅkhāresu kho asati viññāṇaṃ na hoti, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When choices don’t exist there’s no consciousness. When choices cease, consciousness ceases.’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
segments.en: Then Vipassī thought:

segments.pli: ‘kimhi nu kho asati saṅkhārā na honti, kissa nirodhā saṅkhāranirodho’ti?
segments.en: ‘When what doesn’t exist are there no choices? When what ceases do choices cease?’

segments.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
segments.en: Then, through proper attention, Vipassī comprehended with wisdom:

segments.pli: ‘avijjāya kho asati saṅkhārā na honti, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho’ti.
segments.en: ‘When ignorance doesn’t exist there are no choices. When ignorance ceases, choices cease.’

segments.pli: Iti hidaṃ avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho;
segments.en: And so, when ignorance ceases, choices cease.

segments.pli: saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho … pe …
segments.en: When choices cease, consciousness ceases. …

segments.pli: evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti.
segments.en: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.

segments.pli: ‘Nirodho, nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī”ti.
segments.en: ‘Cessation, cessation.’ Such was the vision, knowledge, wisdom, realization, and light that arose in Vipassī, the one intent on awakening, regarding teachings not learned before from another.”

segments.pli: Catutthaṃ.
(Sattannampi buddhānaṃ evaṃ vitthāretabbo.)
segments.en: (The text should be expanded in this way for each of the seven Buddhas.)

suttaplex.blurb: In the far past, the Buddha Vipassī reflected on how the world had fallen into suffering, and became awakened by understanding dependent origination.
